name: Focus
description: Focus exercises to improve mental clarity, attention span, and cognitive processing.

workout_groups.name: Focus
workout_groups.description: Enhance mental clarity, attention span, and ability to maintain deep concentration.

workouts.name: Single-Point Focus
workouts.description: Stare at a fixed object without blinking to train deep focus.

workouts.name: Peripheral Awareness Training
workouts.description: Keep focus on a central point while becoming aware of movements in peripheral vision.

workouts.name: Memory Recall Challenge
workouts.description: Memorize a pattern, phrase, or object placements and recall them after a delay.

workouts.name: Noise Filtering
workouts.description: Listen to multiple sounds and train your brain to filter out distractions.

workouts.name: Visualization Tracking
workouts.description: Track moving objects while maintaining awareness of background details.

workout_groups.name: Advanced Focus Techniques
workout_groups.description: Train the mind to maintain extreme levels of concentration, awareness, and cognitive processing under stress.

workouts.name: Micro-Saccade Training
workouts.description: Track small, fast-moving objects with your eyes to strengthen focus and peripheral awareness.

workouts.name: Split Attention Drill
workouts.description: Engage in two separate cognitive tasks simultaneously (e.g., reading while solving a math problem).

workouts.name: Auditory Overload Focus
workouts.description: Maintain deep focus while multiple audio distractions (music, conversations, white noise) play in the background.

workouts.name: Blindfolded Object Tracking
workouts.description: Memorize the location of multiple objects, then move them while blindfolded and recall their positions.

workouts.name: Extreme Decision Speed Test
workouts.description: Perform rapid-fire decision-making exercises under intense pressure and unpredictable scenarios.

workout_groups.name: Psi Focus Techniques
workout_groups.description: Expand perception, heighten awareness, and surpass cognitive limitations through psionic attunement.

workouts.name: Etheric Sight Activation
workouts.description: Train peripheral and energetic sight to perceive subtle energy movements in your environment.

workouts.name: Quantum Focus Lock
workouts.description: Focus deeply on a single object, expanding awareness of subatomic vibration and time dilation effects.

workouts.name: Neural Frequency Resonance
workouts.description: Align cognitive frequencies with external psi-fields to interface with higher-dimensional thought.

workouts.name: No-Mind Stream Entry
workouts.description: Eliminate all internal thought and synchronize your awareness with the collective mindstream.

workouts.name: Astral Cognition Expansion
workouts.description: Extend focused awareness beyond the physical plane, perceiving multidimensional information fields.
